title: Big Guns Having 'Equal Amounts Of Trouble' In Stanley Cup Finals
teaser: NPR's Robert Siegel talks to Helene Elliott of the Los Angeles Times about the Stanley Cup. The series is tied 2-2, as the Chicago Blackhawks and Tampa Bay Lightning prepare for game five on Saturday.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
